name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.W_eq_W_range_sheafToPresheaf_obj
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
A : Type u_2
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} A
⊢ Eq J.W (CategoryTheory.Localization.LeftBousfield.W fun x => Membership.mem (Set.range (CategoryTheory.sheafToPresheaf J A).obj) x)
decl:
variable (A) in
lemma W_eq_W_range_sheafToPresheaf_obj :
    J.W = LeftBousfield.W (· ∈ Set.range (sheafToPresheaf J A).obj) := by
  apply congr_arg
  ext P
  constructor
  · intro hP
    exact ⟨⟨P, hP⟩, rfl⟩
  · rintro ⟨F, rfl⟩
    exact F.cond

name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.W_sheafToPreheaf_map_iff_isIso
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
A : Type u_2
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} A
F₁ F₂ : CategoryTheory.Sheaf J A
φ : Quiver.Hom F₁ F₂
⊢ Iff (J.W ((CategoryTheory.sheafToPresheaf J A).map φ)) (CategoryTheory.IsIso φ)
decl:
lemma W_sheafToPreheaf_map_iff_isIso {F₁ F₂ : Sheaf J A} (φ : F₁ ⟶ F₂) :
    J.W ((sheafToPresheaf J A).map φ) ↔ IsIso φ := by
  rw [W_eq_W_range_sheafToPresheaf_obj, LeftBousfield.W_iff_isIso _ _ ⟨_, rfl⟩ ⟨_, rfl⟩,
    isIso_iff_of_reflects_iso]

name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.W_adj_unit_app
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_1} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
A : Type u_2
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_2} A
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) A) (CategoryTheory.Sheaf J A)
adj : CategoryTheory.Adjunction G (CategoryTheory.sheafToPresheaf J A)
P : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) A
⊢ J.W (adj.unit.app P)
decl:
lemma W_adj_unit_app (adj : G ⊣ sheafToPresheaf J A) (P : Cᵒᵖ ⥤ A) : J.W (adj.unit.app P) := by
  rw [W_eq_W_range_sheafToPresheaf_obj]
  exact LeftBousfield.W_adj_unit_app adj P

name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.W_iff_isIso_map_of_adjunction
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_1} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
A : Type u_2
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_2} A
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) A) (CategoryTheory.Sheaf J A)
adj : CategoryTheory.Adjunction G (CategoryTheory.sheafToPresheaf J A)
P₁ P₂ : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) A
f : Quiver.Hom P₁ P₂
⊢ Iff (J.W f) (CategoryTheory.IsIso (G.map f))
decl:
lemma W_iff_isIso_map_of_adjunction (adj : G ⊣ sheafToPresheaf J A)
    {P₁ P₂ : Cᵒᵖ ⥤ A} (f : P₁ ⟶ P₂) :
    J.W f ↔ IsIso (G.map f) := by
  rw [W_eq_W_range_sheafToPresheaf_obj]
  exact LeftBousfield.W_iff_isIso_map adj f

name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.W_eq_inverseImage_isomorphisms_of_adjunction
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_1} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
A : Type u_2
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_2} A
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) A) (CategoryTheory.Sheaf J A)
adj : CategoryTheory.Adjunction G (CategoryTheory.sheafToPresheaf J A)
⊢ Eq J.W ((CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.isomorphisms (CategoryTheory.Sheaf J A)).inverseImage G)
decl:
lemma W_eq_inverseImage_isomorphisms_of_adjunction (adj : G ⊣ sheafToPresheaf J A) :
    J.W = (MorphismProperty.isomorphisms _).inverseImage G := by
  rw [W_eq_W_range_sheafToPresheaf_obj,
    LeftBousfield.W_eq_inverseImage_isomorphisms adj]

name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.W_toSheafify
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
A : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.HasWeakSheafify J A
P : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) A
⊢ J.W (CategoryTheory.toSheafify J P)
decl:
lemma W_toSheafify (P : Cᵒᵖ ⥤ A) : J.W (toSheafify J P) :=
  J.W_adj_unit_app (sheafificationAdjunction J A) P

name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.W_iff
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
A : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.HasWeakSheafify J A
P₁ P₂ : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) A
f : Quiver.Hom P₁ P₂
⊢ Iff (J.W f) (CategoryTheory.IsIso ((CategoryTheory.presheafToSheaf J A).map f))
decl:
lemma W_iff {P₁ P₂ : Cᵒᵖ ⥤ A} (f : P₁ ⟶ P₂) :
    J.W f ↔ IsIso ((presheafToSheaf J A).map f) :=
  J.W_iff_isIso_map_of_adjunction (sheafificationAdjunction J A) f

name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.W_eq_inverseImage_isomorphisms
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
A : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.HasWeakSheafify J A
⊢ Eq J.W ((CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.isomorphisms (CategoryTheory.Sheaf J A)).inverseImage (CategoryTheory.presheafToSheaf J A))
decl:
variable (A) in
lemma W_eq_inverseImage_isomorphisms :
    J.W = (MorphismProperty.isomorphisms _).inverseImage (presheafToSheaf J A) :=
  J.W_eq_inverseImage_isomorphisms_of_adjunction (sheafificationAdjunction J A)

name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.instIsLocalizationFunctorOppositeSheafPresheafToSheafW
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
A : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.HasWeakSheafify J A
⊢ (CategoryTheory.presheafToSheaf J A).IsLocalization J.W
decl:
instance : (presheafToSheaf J A).IsLocalization J.W := by
  rw [W_eq_inverseImage_isomorphisms]
  exact (sheafificationAdjunction J A).isLocalization
